Pablo Picasso

Art is a lie that makes us realize truth.

  • Born: 25 October 1881, Málaga, Spain
  • Died: 8 April 1973 (aged 91), Mougins, France
  • Resting place: Château of Vauvenargues
  • Nationality: Spanish
  • Education:
    1. José Ruiz y Blasco (father)
    2. Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando
  • Known for: Painting, drawing, sculpture,
    printmaking, ceramics, stage design, writing
  • Movement: Cubism, Surrealism
  • Notable work:
    1. La Vie (1903)
    2. Family of Saltimbanques (1905)
    3. Les Demoiselles d'Avignon (1907)
    4. Portrait of Daniel-Henry Kahnweiler (1910)
    5. Girl before a Mirror (1932)
    6. Le Rêve (1932)
    7. Guernica (1937)
    8. The Weeping Woman (1937)

If you want to know him more click here.
